preconditions.precondition: Designer requests existing guides and standards from Team Member.

successEndConditions.condition: Guides and standards are updated and confirmed by the team.

failureEndConditions.condition: Guides and standards are not updated or confirmed by the team.

mainSequence.step: Designer requests existing guides and standards from Team Member.
Team Member shares link to Guide Repository and CMS access with Designer.
Guide Repository displays available guides (Style, Design, Content) to Designer.
Designer reviews and compiles relevant information from the guides.
Designer applies guides in the design process using CMS.
CMS confirms the application of guides to Designer.
Designer updates the repository with new/modified guides.
Guide Repository confirms the update to Designer.
Designer shares the updated guides with Team Member.
Team Member reviews and provides feedback on the updated guides.
Team Member confirms the adoption of updated guides to Designer.
